dmca.title: Defamation DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
email


http://uruguay.indymedia.org/mail.php?id=53794&comments=yes

Dear Google Team:


I request that Google removes the following link from its service because
the information they provide, violates my rights under the Uruguayan law,
and qualifies as a crime in the Uruguayan Criminal Law.
It contains personal information, and promotes violence and hatred against
my family and myslef.
Google already removed this same content in the past:

"Estimado Matías:


Las siguientes páginas se han eliminado de Google.com.uy:


http://uruguay.indymedia.org/news/2006/08/53794_comment.php"


But it appeared with a different URL:

http://uruguay.indymedia.org/mail.php?id=53794&comments=yes
Please find attached a signed copy of the communication.
I appreciate the courteous and prompt attention that you always give to
these matters. Thank you.
Sincerily,

Matias Cañibe

1. http://www.google.com.uy/


2. Uruguay, Uruguayan citizenship.


3. Search Query:  Matias Cañibe

Allegedly Illegal Webpages:

http://uruguay.indymedia.org/mail.php?id=53794&comments=yes


The text 'se kago la vida, se merece estar donde esta, kon la gente de
mierda ke esta y ojala ke nadie se olvide de esa kara, ni de la de su puta
novia, ni de donde vive No dejemos ke viva en paz!!', ' ya todo el mundo
sabe quien es, que su familia es una mierda, que su novia es apestosa,
quien mierda medianamente respetable le va a dar bola a este
gil?  suicidate', 'no se preocupen que con la gente de jiujitsu y vale todo
de la academia estamos preparados para partirles la cara a este y a los 3
amigos giles si llegan a aparecer de nuevo...tambien se la tenemos pronta a
la empresa del viejo a media cuadra de fernandez crespo...denim creo que se
llama...no creo que tengan huevos para hacer algo...que no me lo cruce
nunca por bien de el.' on the webpage above violates my rights because it
contains allegedly defamatory material and violent threaths against myself
and against the commerce of my now defunct father, not permitted under the
laws of the country in which I reside or am a citizen." 


 Article 333. (Defamation)


If someone in front of several people who gathered or separated, but in
such a way as to spread the version, attributed to a person a specific
event, which, if true, could lead to a criminal or disciplinary
proceedings, or expose to hatred or to public contempt, shall be punished
by imprisonment of four months to three years in penitentiary or a fine of
80 UR (Eighty-indexed units) at 800 U.R. (Eight hundred indexed units).


334. (Injury)


The former cases under the preceding article, offend in any way, with
words, written or made, honor, fairness or decency of a person, be punished
by imprisonment from three to eighteen months imprisonment or a fine of 60
UR (Sixty-indexed units) and 400 U.R. (Four units indexed).

The Uruguayan Constitution Article 7 establishes that:


The inhabitants of the Republic are entitled to be protected in the
enjoyment of life, honor, freedom, safety, labor and property.

The contents of this websites expose me to the public hatred, insults my
honour and threats my family's well being, they also cause me a great
professional prejudice, I'm a law student with an excellent record and I
had trouble in my job due to the contents of the websites posted above.


4. Matías Cañibe, matheusuy@hotmail.com


5. I have a good faith belief that the information specified above is not
permitted by applicable law.


6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this
notification is accurate.


7.
